players.name: Alice
memory: You're Alice, the villager.
Day 1 begins.

players.name: Bob
memory: You're Bob, the mafioso.
Night 1 begins.
You killed Alice.
The villager Alice was found dead.
Beware, Charlie is the detective and discovered you're the mafioso.
Day 1 begins.
Diana: remained silent.
You: remained silent.
Charlie: "I investigated Bob and found him mafia. He killed Alice. Vote him out."
Diana: "I don't trust Charlie's claim. Bob seems innocent. Vote Charlie out."
You: "I think Charlie is lying. He might be a villager or even the mafia. His claim about me is suspicious. Vote Charlie out."
Charlie: "Bob killed Alice. He is mafia. No one else could. Vote him out."
